# Preconditions.RunPrePostConditionTests property

Boolean switch to controlling the pre/post conditions test execution: If true: precondition/postcondition tests are performed If false: precondition/postcondition tests are not performed

```csharp
public static bool RunPrePostConditionTests { get; set; }
```
